review:
this movue is just great. ayushman khurana ia charming. the movie gave beautiful messages.
1. sperm dination is not bad as seen by indian society. you can actually give life to a parent who ia dreaming about children but can't have that. 
2. marrying a divorce ia no big deal. after all it might not be her fault. 
3. inter cast marriage. bong girl married punjabi boy. opposite culture but when you love nothing matters.
4. don't lie to your partner. you might think you are protecting them from the truth. but they has the right to know the truth. 
5. if you can't have kids, you can always adopt one. you will give life to a soul and can raise as your own. 

in a nutshell brilliant movie. everyone must watch it at least once.

hello
i have heard about film from my bestie but never got chance to watch it. today i saw vicky donor i can say must watch movie.i am in love with this movie.its a great love story, director have balanced the things in a  proper way  like love, romance, sperm, comedy etc.this film shows that donating sperm is not a cheap job. society needs it.
i suggest you all to watch film u would love it. once again amazing movie

first of all, the movie gives a special social message. except this message the movie fully contains with emotion, romanticism and the love chemistry between yami and ayushman was fabulous. i specially like yami. not she is my favourite actress but when i watch her movie i become her fan. she was also fantastic and gorgeous in kaabil also. i just like her. and about ayushmann, i don't know what talent is in him, he is  continuously choosing a different type of contents, most of them are great. i think after aamir khan, he will receive the "perfectionist" title before his name.

vicky donor is a 2012 indian romantic comedy film directed by shoojit sircar and produced by actor john abraham.[11] it stars ayushmann khurrana, yami gautam and annu kapoor in the lead roles, and is khurrana's hindi film debut. it released on 20 april 2012 in around 750 screens across india[12][13] and received positive response worldwide.[12] vicky donor opened to critical acclaim and performed strongly at the box office.[14][15][16] the film won the national film award for best popular film providing wholesome entertainment at the 60th national film awards. the film is remade in telugu as naruda donoruda starring sumanth and pallavi subhash.[17][citation needed]. this film has been remade in tamil as dharala prabhu starring harish kalyan.

i have been in love with this movie ever since i saw it. with a very powerful message and addressing to a very common setback of today's busy world ' infertility ' this movie is a pleasure to watch. also actors have done a great job. kudos to each n everyone attached to this creation

it is an excellent movie and you should definitely watch it. ayushman nails the role of a sperm donor in his debut movie. the movie shows that even today the society has not been able to come up with sperm donation. the narrative is in a unique style of both comedy nd seriousness.
it is a must watch movie... in the end of the film you will surely have wet eyes and a deep smile. beautifully written and best performances given by the debut actors ayushmann and yami.

even for a person like me who has always had a very low opinion about hindi movies(all of them have a quota of silly songs,stupid dances in foreign locales,un-believable fights,a dose of melodrama and a predictable story line) vicky donor is a pleasant surprise.it has an excellent script,good acting and a message.the director who i presume is a bong'has done a super job.of all course top directors are mostly bengalis.i expect more such movies in future also,so that i can start watching hindi movies again.
this movie gives out a very good message to society without being serious. it's a modern movie without being vulgar and all the actors have done a great job.
